Albany.Albany\u2013Rensselaer station: Rensselaer Rail Station is a train station in Rensselaer, New York, located 1.5 miles (2.4 km) from downtown Albany across the Hudson River. As of 2010 it was Amtrak's ninth-busiest station, as well as the busiest to serve a metro area with a population smaller than 2 million. It is served by Amtrak's Empire Corridor routes, including the Lake Shore Limited, whose Boston and New York branches diverge at the station.
